name: HELITRANS PYRINEES, S.L.
about: HELITRANS Pyrinees, S.L. is a renowned helicopter training and operations company based in Andorra-La Seu d’Urgell Airport. As part of the Helitrans group, one of Norway’s largest helicopter operators, we specialize in advanced helicopter training and specialized missions. Our training programs are enhanced by state-of-the-art simulators, including the world’s first VR-based helicopter simulators for the Airbus H125. We offer comprehensive training for both private and commercial pilots, with a focus on safety and real-world scenarios. Our experienced instructors and cutting-edge technology ensure that our students are well-prepared for a variety of roles, including search and rescue, firefighting, and commercial operations. With a strong commitment to innovation and safety, HELITRANS Pyrinees is dedicated to training tomorrow’s pilots to the highest standards.
